      public void removePlayer (@NotNull @NotNull String player)

      player - the player to remove

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Reset the points, counter objective and final leaderboard for every player, but it keeps the players in the plateau

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer (@NotNull @NotNull String newPlayer)
      Add a new player to the plateau with 0 points and 0 counter objectives
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - nickname of the new player to add

    • addCounterObjective

      public void addCounterObjective (@NotNull @NotNull String player) throws IllegalPlateauActionException
      The counter-objective is a Map that contains the number of objectives completed by each player; this method adds 1 to the counter-objective of the specified player
      Parameters:
      player - the player to add the counter-objective to
      Throws:
      IllegalPlateauActionException - if the player is not found

      Returns:
      the points of the specified player
      Throws:
      IllegalPlateauActionException - if the player is not found

      public int getCounterObjective (@NotNull @NotNull String player) throws IllegalPlateauActionException
      Get the number of completed objectives of the specified player
      Parameters:
      player - the player to get the counter-objective of
      Returns:
      the number of completed objectives of the specified player
      Throws:
      IllegalPlateauActionException - if the player is not found

    • setFinalLeaderboard

      public void setFinalLeaderboard()
      Set the final leaderboard, the final leaderboard is a Map that contains the final position of each player, more than one player can have the same final position if they have the same points and counter-objective. It will be considered a tie

    • getPlayerFinishingPosition

      public int getPlayerFinishingPosition (@NotNull @NotNull String player) throws IllegalPlateauActionException
      Get the final position of the specified player, more than one player can have the same final position if they have the same * points and counter-objective. It will be considered a tie
      Parameters:
      player - the player to get the final position of
      Returns:
      the final position of the specified player
      Throws:
      IllegalPlateauActionException - if the player is not found

    • getWinners

      @NotNull public @NotNull Set<String> getWinners()
      Get the winner/winners of the game, the winner are the players that have position 1 in the final leaderboard
      Returns:
      set with the nickname of the winner/winners

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner (@NotNull @NotNull String player)
      Arbitrary set the winner of the game, the winner will have position 1 in the final leaderboard, the other players will have position 2
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the winner

      public void hardReset()
